title: A Bottled Cherry Angel
description: If Match and Emma were going into town then there could be no question of Midge not going with them. They always did things together. They always had done, right from Juniors. The trouble is that the three M's - Midge, Match and Emma - are now Seniors. And while Match and Emma like hanging around shops and going to discos, Midge still likes playing and hates boys. She's in no hurry to grow up. But then, on a snowy day in the park, Midge meets someone who feels just like she does. And this strange, shabby boy changes everything...
author: Jean Ure
